charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_0100_:
Yes! That’s it!
Now attack like you mean it!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1101_0200_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed to the caves
to meet up with Clair and her Kingdra. When [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ]
arrived, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found them training together.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_0400_:
I don’t have time to wait around for
people all day. When I ask you to meet me,
I expect you to come immediately. OK?
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_0600_:
Me? A Gym Leader on the same level
as the Elite Four?! Of course I’m busy!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0402_0800_:
Well, I suppose I could forgive you
just this once. I’m feeling nice today.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1000_:
I heard some good news.
Lance is here on Pasio now.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1100_: You may have heard of him.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1200_:
He’s the Champion of the Indigo Plateau
Pokémon League...
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1400_:
Lance has always treated me like a child,
so to be honest, I can’t say I’m his biggest fan.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1500_:
My Kingdra and his Dragonite have
a bit of a history together as well.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1600_:
Back when Kingdra was still a little Horsea,
she fought against Dragonite with all
her might.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1700_:
Look, just hearing Dragonite’s name
is getting her all worked up...
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1800_:
Anyway, our confidence took a huge
hit after that match with Lance.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1900_:
I was still a child back then.
We didn’t stand a chance against him.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2000_:
I have dreams about that day every once
in a while, even now.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2100_:
Heh heh... Lance didn’t get the last laugh
in the end, though.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2200_:
We stood our ground and managed to get
one good hit in before he beat us. The look of
surprise on Lance’s face was priceless!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2300_:
We gave him a good scare that day,
didn’t we, Kingdra? A real Water Gun
in the eye!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_2500_:
I know. The two of us have been a
powerful team ever since we were children.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0302_2600_:
Water Gun, huh?
I see what you did there.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0402_2700_:
What? I assure you, you did not!
Silly jokes are beneath me...
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2800_:
Anyway! Horsea continued to give her all
for me, eventually evolving into the
magnificent Kingdra you see here now.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2900_:
Kingdra generally live deep below the
ocean’s surface and are rarely seen in
the wild, you know.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3000_:
Even Lance hasn’t been able to fully
utilize the power of his Kingdra.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3100_:
I, and I alone, have accomplished that!
I should be known as the world’s best
dragon master.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3200_:
To tell you the truth, the thought of being
known as the best is a little unnerving...
but I won’t complain.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_3400_:
I suppose hearing that from you
gives me a little more confidence.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_3500_:
You’re right—I AM strong.
But I can still grow stronger.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0402_3700_:
Hmm... You and I? Train together?
I suppose I could get behind that.
Thank you. For thinking of me.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3800_:
You know, I think I feel better now, after
talking all of that out with you. I feel like
I’ve got my emotions in order now, at least.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3900_: I believe I can trust you as a fellow Trainer.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_4000_:
Something tells me the two of us are
going to soar to greater heights together,
like a pair of Dragon Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0301_4200_: You can count on me as a friend!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_4300_: Thank you! It’ll be good to have you around.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0302_4400_: You can count on me as a partner!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0402_4500_:
Right, then. Let’s soar to greater
heights together!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_4600_:
I think Kingdra is happy about this
arrangement as well.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_4700_:
You might still be an up-and-coming
Trainer, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_4800_:
but something about being around you
mysteriously seems to put my heart at ease.
